segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the woman polishing that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in a puddle, but she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing wildly, water everywhere on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's terrifying how slippery that must be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, the boy's stretching up on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies out of the jar, looking so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eager, arm up high for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But if that stool tips, he'll come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel my heart racing just watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, but can't brighten the worry I feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should notice the water or the kids before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of little disasters in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, they're going to regret this mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems like a safe haven compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR
